annotation: may be borrowed from Suru Rabwanga dialect
(1-1), "What is your name" (lit., who your name)
The ton of this word depends on the ton of the word it follows. Hence, it can be a hight ton, a middle, or a low one.

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia
